scripts.prepare-electron: mkdirp ./tmp/web && ncp resources/electron tmp && ncp build tmp/web
scripts.package-desktop: npm run prepare-electron && electron-packager ./tmp/ --all --asar --electron-version=1.7.11 --icon="resources/assets/icon" --out=./dist/desktop/ --overwrite && rimraf tmp
scripts.build-desktop: npm run build -- --env=desktop && npm run package-desktop
scripts.generate-mobile-assets: npm run generate-mobile-assets-icon && npm run generate-mobile-assets-splash
scripts.prepare-mobile: mkdirp dist/mobile/www && ncp build dist/mobile/www && ncp resources/cordova dist/mobile
scripts.package-mobile: npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare && cd ../.. && npm run generate-mobile-assets && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare
scripts.package-mobile-ios: npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare ios && cd ../.. && npm run generate-mobile-assets && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare ios
scripts.package-mobile-android: npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare android && cd ../.. && npm run generate-mobile-assets && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare android
scripts.package-mobile-windows: npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare windows && cd ../.. && npm run generate-mobile-assets && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare windows
scripts.build-mobile: npm run build -- --env=mobile && npm run package-mobile
scripts.build-mobile-ios: npm run build -- --env=mobile && npm run package-mobile-ios
scripts.build-mobile-android: npm run build -- --env=mobile && npm run package-mobile-android
scripts.build-mobile-windows: npm run build -- --env=mobile && npm run package-mobile-windows
